name.es: Kurobana el Lobo de Flor Sombra
name.fr: Kurobana le Loup de la Fleur de l'Ombre
name.ja: <ruby>花<rt>か</rt></ruby><ruby>牙<rt>げ</rt></ruby><ruby>狼<rt>ろう</rt></ruby>のクロバナ

text.en: Lurking in the shadows to save its master of the grass clan from danger. Even after its defeat, it will return from behind the grassy knoll.
text.ja: 陰に忍び、主の危機を救う草の一派。討ち取られても、草葉の陰から馳せ参じる。
text.ko: 그늘에 숨어, 주인을 위기에서 구해내는 풀의 일파. 목숨을 잃어도, 저승에서 뛰쳐나온다.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Dynamic Eternal Live!!

ko.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Dynamic Eternal Live!!
